name: skyfall (itch) (ekkivox)
description:
Skyfall
  • Endless game where you, as a player have to dodge rocks falling from the sky!
  • Collect coins falling from the sky, that you can later on use, to buy upgrades and power-ups for you character.
  • Reach the highest score.

Key features:

  • Endless gameplay
  • Simple and easy to control
  • Easy to understand, how the game is played
  • Android and Windows compatibility

Keep in mind, this game is in it's very early stage of development . You may come around a lot of bugs and missing features, but im working on adding them! so be patient for the full game release.
